title: 安田記念の後に・勝ってばばんばー

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I beat Ikuno...!
I did it, I did it!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: I still need more adjustments.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for today,
Tannhauser-san.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: What's up, getting all formal~.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
...This 'Yasuda Kinen',
I was in perfect condition for it.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
But even then, I lost.
It would be a lie to say I'm not frustrated.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
But I can't just mope around.
Especially with someone as positive as you here.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Next time, I look forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Hehe.
No, me too~.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
By the way, there's a place I'd like to stop by on the way back,
if that's okay?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: What is it?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: A super sento.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Sento baths have thermal effects, hydrostatic pressure effects, etc.,
offering relaxation benefits from multiple angles.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Relaxation leads to better sleep, and then
creates focus, preventing tomorrow's injuries—

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
In other words, 'When tired, heal'.
This cycle connects to future health.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I, I see!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Now that's decided, let's go right away.
Long baths are counterproductive, so within reasonable limits.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haa~~, it's warm.
I'm all toasty from the core~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I think I'll sleep well today...
Hwaa~.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, that's the most important thing.
...Please don't fall asleep here, okay?
In any case, the two of them warmed up both body and mind at the bathhouse, gaining energy for what comes next.
